name: OG Milk Tea
description: Our classic go-to: the original Milk Tea! Made with our signature brown sugar blend pearls.

name: Strawberry Tea with Lychee Jelly
description: Feeling sweet? Try our famous Cherry Blossom festival flavor, a fruity strawberry tea with lychee jellies!

name: Taro Milk Tea
description: Classic milk tea; taro flavored. Includes pearls.

name: Peach Green Tea
description: Refreshing fruity green tea. Add-on options available.

name: Oreo Milk Tea
description: Looking for a sweet treat? Our oreo-flavored milk tea with oreo crumble is a must-have!

name: Espresso Burst
description: Energy booster. Creamy espresso drink for the busy days.

name: Pumpkin Pie Cream Tea
description: Perfect fall season flavor! Light cream tea with pumpkin pie flavors!

name: Jasmine Milk Tea
description: Sophisticated, fancy, and aromatic. Jasmine tea with milk and star jelly.

name: Blueberry Bliss
description: Indulge in the refreshing taste of blueberries with our Blueberry Bliss drink.

name: Vanilla Chai Latte
description: Experience the warm and comforting flavors of vanilla and chai spices in our Vanilla Chai Latte.

name: Mango Tango Smoothie
description: Get a tropical kick with our Mango Tango Smoothie, a refreshing blend of mango goodness.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Savor the rich, caramel sweetness of our Caramel Macchiato with a kick of espresso.
